{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker

    | name      = Unknown Speaker

}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker

    | text      = It's strange to me that the companies are capable of such heights and such lows.
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker

}}

{{TranscriptBlock

{{TranscriptBlock

}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker

{{TranscriptBlock

}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:07:20.259

}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:07:21.259
    | text      = So, we're going to start here on June 1st, Monday's show.
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:07:24.740
    | text      = And at this point, Alex, there's big news.
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:07:28.060
    | text      = There's some big things happening.
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:07:30.819
    | text      = And Alex gets down to it here in this first clip.
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:07:34.100
    | text      = We're going to have Savannah Hernandez and Zach.
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:07:37.379
    | text      = He's been here five years as a camera guy.
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:07:38.740
    | text      = I don't know if he wants his last name on air, so we'll find out when he comes on.
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:07:42.060
    | text      = But he was down there.
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:07:43.899
    | text      = He's now been accused by the Twitter mob of, he's the one that burned the homeless camp.
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:07:49.120
    | text      = Because when they're burning it, one old Marine who's homeless goes and says, how dare you?
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:07:53.259
    | text      = Antifa runs off like cockroaches when the lights turn on.
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:07:56.180
    | text      = They run up to Zach.
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:07:58.860
    | text      = Zach doesn't run because he didn't burn it down.
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:08:01.920
    | text      = And the guy starts screaming saying, why have you done this?
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:08:04.660
    | text      = Because he just sees him as a protester.
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:08:07.939
    | text      = Top of Twitter, Alex Jones, stages attack, burns homeless camp.
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:08:13.300
    | text      = So to be perfectly transparent with you and the audience, Alex did play the video of the
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:08:17.779
    | text      = man experiencing homelessness who had his mattress set on fire in Austin on his show
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:08:21.480
    | text      = on Sunday.
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:08:22.939
    | text      = And I chose not to include it on our episode that we put out on Monday for a specific reason.
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:08:28.180
    | text      = This was an editorial decision that I made because I tried to get to the bottom of what
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:08:31.860
    | text      = was going on in the video, and I couldn't find anything.
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:08:34.980
    | text      = In other cases, the ambiguous video had some context clues that allowed me to get something
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:08:39.539
    | text      = of a grip on them.
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:08:40.820
    | text      = Like in the case of the bricks in Dallas, we know what building that video is in front
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:08:44.460
    | text      = of, and we can discuss the idea of bricks being planted there in the context of some
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:08:48.519
    | text      = surrounding clues.
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:08:50.480
    | text      = The case of the video of the mattress fire was another thing altogether.
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:08:53.820
    | text      = All you had was Alex presenting a video of a mattress being burned and his claim that
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:08:58.419
    | text      = it was the protesters who set it on fire and other people saying Alex did it.
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:09:02.820
    | text      = In that kind of situation, I'm presented with a couple of options.
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:09:06.360
    | text      = The first is to accept Alex's framing of the story and work to explain how it's an isolated
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:09:11.019
    | text      = incident of individuals and it doesn't necessarily implicate the larger character of the protests.
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:09:16.299
    | text      = This isn't a good option because it relies wholly on taking Alex's word about an unclear
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:09:20.200
    | text      = situation and it's usually unwise to do that.
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:09:23.299
    | text      = The second option is to speculate that all is not what it appears to be.
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:09:27.379
    | text      = This could take the form of saying info has probably set the whole thing up or that it
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:09:30.700
    | text      = was the Proud Boys or any possible entity you could come up with to point the finger
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:09:34.340
    | text      = at.
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:09:36.100
    | text      = This option feels better to someone who has the positions and beliefs I do because I hate
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:09:40.340
    | text      = to imagine that someone who would be associated with protests that I support and believe in
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:09:44.539
    | text      = the cause of would victimize a person experiencing homelessness like that.
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:09:48.460
    | text      = It's ugly, and to avoid the feelings that that ugliness would bring up, way too many
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:09:52.980
    | text      = people have blindly accepted this conclusion with no evidence that InfoWars staged the
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:09:57.399
    | text      = whole thing.
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:09:58.899
    | text      = The third option, and the one I took, was to be cautious and not discuss it until there
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:10:02.580
    | text      = was more to go on.
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:10:05.220
    | text      = Isolated incidents of property damage, even if this egregious, are not so pressing a news
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:10:09.259
    | text      = item that we should feel like we have to make unforced errors by either making unfounded
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:10:13.899
    | text      = accusations of a false flag or making the mistake of ceding the ground to Alex and accepting
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:10:18.899
    | text      = his framing.
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:10:19.899
    | text      = Both of those are not winning solutions.
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:10:22.759
    | text      = It's hard, and I fully understand people's impulse to craft a theory that Alex or InfoWars
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:10:26.980
    | text      = did this to make protesters look bad, but I have to say that it's been real disheartening
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:10:31.460
    | text      = and a bummer to watch people do this.
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:10:33.779
    | text      = I've heard a number of rationalizations for why someone would assume Alex was behind it.
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:10:38.799
    | text      = One is that he's capable of doing something like this, and I concede that he almost certainly
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:10:43.059
    | text      = is, and if there were evidence that he did it, I wouldn't be surprised at all, but being
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:10:47.820
    | text      = capable of a false flag publicity stunt is not the same thing as actually doing it.
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:10:53.320
    | text      = Another rationalization is that Alex lies all the time about other people, so it's fine
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:10:57.200
    | text      = to weaponize a conspiracy against him, and I have something important to say about anyone
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:11:02.159
    | text      = who might feel that way.
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:11:03.940
    | text      = I'm often unfairly accused of being a when-they-go-low-we-go-high guy, and I resent that, and this is nothing
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:11:10.539
    | text      = even close to that in this case in particular.
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:11:14.379
    | text      = Absent proof that InfoWars set this fire, this is a conspiracy theory that some people
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:11:18.980
    | text      = are choosing to accept as fact or likely fact because it helps them build a narrative more
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:11:23.659
    | text      = conveniently.
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:11:25.639
    | text      = After three and a half years of studying Alex Jones, I'm comfortable saying that this pattern
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:11:29.659
    | text      = of thinking of accepting conspiracy's absent evidence is what made Alex Jones into Alex
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:11:35.139
    | text      = Jones.
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:11:36.700
    | text      = We're a show that's about this mentality and how it's corrosive.
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:11:39.720
    | text      = We primarily discuss this through the prism of Alex Jones because he's the most flagrant
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:11:43.559
    | text      = and obvious example of someone who's become super famous, whose entire career is based
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:11:48.340
    | text      = on conspiracy narratives and building them out of things he cannot ever come close to
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:11:52.440
    | text      = proving.
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:11:53.580
    | text      = If you look at all the people that we covered, that's essentially one of the big commonalities
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:11:57.779
    | text      = between them.
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:11:58.779
    | text      = Yeah.
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:11:59.779
    | text      = That's their job.
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:12:00.779
    | text      = Yeah.
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:12:01.779
    | text      = They view that centrally as their job.
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:12:04.500
    | text      = Alex doesn't do anything.
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:12:05.820
    | text      = He doesn't make anything.
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:12:06.820
    | text      = He doesn't even have any creative impulse because all the things on those shirts are
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:12:11.419
    | text      = probably stolen from some random person or a caller.
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:12:14.820
    | text      = He doesn't make anything other than lies out of stuff that he can't prove.
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:12:19.419
    | text      = That's it.
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:12:20.419
    | text      = Yeah.
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:12:21.419
    | text      = Conspiracy thinking and this kind of shit is a manifestation generally of laziness and
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:12:25.179
    | text      = allowing it to be your process in one case only makes it easier to accept as your process
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:12:29.139
    | text      = the next time.
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:12:30.580
    | text      = On some level, this is why Alex sucks so much.
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:12:33.580
    | text      = He's learned over the course of his career that he doesn't need to do better than just
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:12:36.600
    | text      = make something up and his audience will be trained to accept that level of reasoning
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:12:40.220
    | text      = as wisdom.
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:12:41.919
    | text      = If people are going to be opposed to that kind of information economy that the right
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:12:45.220
    | text      = wing has thrust us into, it's crucial that they don't become lazy themselves and just
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:12:49.259
    | text      = use the same tricks.
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:12:51.059
    | text      = This isn't because the tricks are inherently wrong, though I do think they are.
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:12:54.860
    | text      = It's because they're corrosive.
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:12:56.820
    | text      = They work well.
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:12:58.419
    | text      = You could smear people like crazy and it works, but they also hurt you when you use them.
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:13:04.299
    | text      = These techniques are bad for you.
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:13:07.940
    | text      = Naturally, probably the less abstract consideration is that you can't prove that Alex or Infowars
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:13:14.299
    | text      = started that fire.
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:13:16.460
    | text      = If you can't, you might as well be working for Infowars when you make that accusation.
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:13:20.340
    | text      = Oh, yeah.
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:13:21.340
    | text      = A Twitter account that posted this accusation got over 13,000 retweets and the video on
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:13:25.960
    | text      = Twitter had almost 25 million views just earlier when I was looking at it.
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:13:32.299
    | text      = Oh, no.
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:13:33.299
    | text      = Stop it, people.
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:13:34.299
    | text      = He's getting tons and tons of free press.
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:13:35.980
    | text      = Guess what?
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:13:36.980
    | text      = Like I said, if you can't prove that he did that, you've given him the perfect gift.
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:13:40.279
    | text      = He can point to this as a great piece of evidence that the media and the left, they always lie
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:13:43.980
    | text      = about him because he's always right about everything and that he's too much of a threat.
}}
